name: YOLO-predictor-example-0
description: Toy software to demonstrate how to upload Analysis annotations to Cytomine.

inputs.name: Working path
inputs.description: The path on host machine where data is stored

inputs.name: Cytomine terms to consider
inputs.description: The list of Cytomine term IDs (separated by comma) to consider in the dataset. If unset, all terms are used

inputs.name: Cytomine tags to consider for images
inputs.description: The list of Cytomine tag IDs (separated by comma) that images must have to be used in dataset. If unset, all images in the project are used.
